UPDATE tb_basic_sys_dictionary as `tbsd`
`tbsd`.`id` = #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.id},
`tbsd`.`parentId` = #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.parentId},
`tbsd`.`name` = NULL,
`tbsd`.`name` = #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.name},
`tbsd`.`identifying` = NULL,
`tbsd`.`identifying` = #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.identifying},
`tbsd`.`sort` = #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.sort},
`tbsd`.`description` = NULL,
`tbsd`.`description` = #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.description},
`tbsd`.`status` = #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.status},
`tbsd`.`createdAt` = '',
`tbsd`.`createdAt` = #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.createdAt},
`tbsd`.`createdUserId` = #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.createdUserId},
`tbsd`.`updatedAt` = '',
`tbsd`.`updatedAt` = #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.updatedAt},
`tbsd`.`updatedUserId` = #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.updatedUserId},
mapper.select:
SELECT
DISTINCT
`tbsd`.* FROM tb_basic_sys_dictionary as `tbsd`
GROUP BY
`tbsd`.`#{field}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbsd`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_dictionary as `tbsd`
GROUP BY
`tbsd`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysDictionaryPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbsd`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_dictionary as `tbsd`
GROUP BY
`tbsd`.`#{groupField}`
